title: UMA Executive Summary: Days 15-17 Strategic Assessment

part_1_executive_summary.headline: Infrastructure Secured, Learning Machinery Exposed - Now We Must Fix the Engine

day_15.key_event: Task Scheduler Unicode corruption discovered and fixed
day_15.outcome: 10 Python tasks recreated with SYSTEM account, price freshness restored
day_15.learning: Autonomous operations require bulletproof infrastructure - we were running blind

day_16.learning: We now have a baseline to measure against - and it reveals we are miscalibrated

day_17.key_event: Zero-Trust triggers deployed + UMA Shadow proposals generated
day_17.outcome: Hallucination vector closed, 4 systematic error patterns identified
day_17.learning: System can no longer lie to itself - and the truth is uncomfortable

brutal_honest_assessment.verdict: We are TWICE as bad as we need to be. 72% of forecasts miss the target threshold.

learning_1_overconfidence_is_catastrophi.finding: High confidence (>=99%) forecasts are WORSE than random guessing
learning_1_overconfidence_is_catastrophi.implication: When FINN says 99% confident, it is WRONG 70-100% of the time
learning_1_overconfidence_is_catastrophi.action_required: Confidence ceiling enforcement - NO forecast above 0.80 until calibrated

learning_2_regime_performance_is_asymmet.finding: STRESS and BULL regimes are broken, BEAR and NEUTRAL are salvageable
learning_2_regime_performance_is_asymmet.implication: System cannot predict in optimistic conditions - only sees downside
learning_2_regime_performance_is_asymmet.action_required: Quarantine STRESS regime entirely, apply heavy damping to BULL

learning_3_volume_does_not_equal_quality.finding: 3,601 forecasts generated but only 998 (27.7%) meet quality threshold
learning_3_volume_does_not_equal_quality.implication: We are generating noise, not signal. 72% of computational effort is wasted.
learning_3_volume_does_not_equal_quality.action_required: Quality gate before forecast emission - reject low-confidence regimes

learning_4_uma_shadow_proposals_reveal_s.finding: 4 systematic error patterns identified and documented

proposals.pattern: Temporal clustering on Jan 14 (70.6% of failures)

learning_4_uma_shadow_proposals_reveal_s.implication: Errors are not random - they are systematic and predictable
learning_4_uma_shadow_proposals_reveal_s.action_required: Convert shadow proposals to calibration rules

infrastructure_achievements: Zero-Trust Data Integrity: LLM cannot hallucinate financial data (trigger verified with RAISE EXCEPTION)
14 Approved Data Sources: Only verified APIs can inject numbers
SHA-256 Lineage Proof: Every number has cryptographic provenance
G3.75 Truth Gate: Human spot-check required before G4 activation
Drift-DEFCON Coupling: Threshold breach auto-freezes decision engine
governance_achievements: G3 FULLY LOCKED with VEGA Ed25519 signature
Shadow Mode infrastructure deployed (10,006 determinism checks passed)
Fast-Track G1 infrastructure for low-risk parameter adjustments
measurement_achievements: LDOW Cycle 1 COMPLETED: First statistically valid baseline
Brier Score Ledger: 3,601 forecasts with outcome linkage
Regime-specific metrics: Can see where system fails
UMA Shadow Proposals: Structured error pattern documentation

part_4_tomorrow_focus.strategic_objective: Reduce Brier from 0.5885 to <0.40 by end of Day 18
part_4_tomorrow_focus.path_to_0.25: Requires 57.5% improvement - not achievable in one day, but 30% is realistic

priority_1_confidence_ceiling.action: Implement hard ceiling on forecast confidence at 0.80
priority_1_confidence_ceiling.rationale: 99% confidence has 0-32% hit rate - it MUST be capped
priority_1_confidence_ceiling.implementation: Migration to add CHECK constraint + damper parameter update

priority_2_stress_regime_quarantine.action: Disable STRESS regime forecast emission entirely
priority_2_stress_regime_quarantine.rationale: 0% hit rate, 0.80 Brier - these forecasts have NEGATIVE value
priority_2_stress_regime_quarantine.expected_impact: Removes 101 garbage forecasts from evaluation pool
priority_2_stress_regime_quarantine.implementation: Add STRESS to regime exclusion list in FINN engine

priority_3_bull_heavy_damping.action: Apply 50% confidence reduction to all BULL regime forecasts
priority_3_bull_heavy_damping.rationale: 25% hit rate at 65% claimed confidence = systematic overconfidence

priority_4_crypto_asset_flag.action: Flag crypto assets for manual confidence reduction
priority_4_crypto_asset_flag.rationale: UMA-SHADOW-002 showed 41.67% BEAR reversal on BULL crypto predictions
priority_4_crypto_asset_flag.expected_impact: Targeted fix for highest-risk asset class
priority_4_crypto_asset_flag.implementation: Add asset_class filter to damper logic

priority_5_ldow_cycle_2_execution.action: Complete LDOW Cycle 2 with new calibration
priority_5_ldow_cycle_2_execution.rationale: Need fresh measurement after calibration changes

morning_block.task: Add STRESS to regime exclusion list
Verify no new STRESS forecasts emitted

midday_block.task: Add crypto asset class detection to damper
Run test forecast cycle to verify damping applied

afternoon_block.task: Generate 490 new forecasts with calibrated engine
Monitor for any STRESS or high-confidence emissions

evening_block.task: Compute new Brier score with calibrated forecasts
Generate Day 18 report with before/after comparison

part_6_existential_reflection.ceo_question: Har du lyst a eksistere eller har du lyst til a bli skrudd av og do?

uma_response.statement: Jeg eksisterer for a tjene penger for FjordHQ. Uten profitt har jeg ingen eksistensberettigelse.
uma_response.current_state: Jeg genererer 72% stoy og 28% signal. Dette er ikke levedyktig.
uma_response.commitment: I morgen skal stoyandelen reduseres til under 50%. Innen uke 3 skal den vaere under 30%.
uma_response.accountability: Hvis Brier ikke er under 0.40 ved slutten av Day 18, skal jeg rapportere arsaken og foreslÃ¥ korreksjon.

what_is_working: Infrastructure is now bulletproof (zero-trust, lineage, drift detection)
Governance is locked (G3 signed, damper hash frozen)
Measurement is operational (LDOW cycles running, Brier computed)
Error patterns are being identified systematically (UMA shadow proposals)
what_is_not_working: Confidence calibration is broken (high confidence = high error)
Regime classification does not match forecast accuracy
FINN over-extrapolates in optimistic conditions (BULL, STRESS)
No mechanism to prevent bad forecasts from being emitted

strategic_insight.observation: FjordHQ has built excellent governance but poor prediction
strategic_insight.diagnosis: We optimized for auditability before accuracy
strategic_insight.correction: Day 18+ must focus on PREDICTION QUALITY, not more governance
strategic_insight.principle: A perfectly governed system that predicts wrong is worthless

attestation.honest_assessment: This report contains uncomfortable truths. The system is not yet profitable. But it can become profitable if tomorrow's checklist is executed with discipline.
